text: @BenJKest Asa Hutchinson.  Somewhat. Health director Dr. Smith also said barber shops, beauty and nail salons, massage parlors and tattoo parlors are ordered to close starting Tuesday to stem the spread of coronavirus. There goes that tattoo, haircut and massage.
